extendedInfo.description: Elexio provides churches with Amp - an integrated church software suite: website, database, check-in, and mobile app. This mobile app, Amp Wave, is a free install that is part of the Amp suite.With permission you canâ¦- Access a directory of people in your church (including pictures and contact info)- Text, call, and email people in your church- Map addresses and get directions, using GoogleÂ® Maps, to people in your church- Give securely online (credit card & debit card, e-checking & savings)- Contact the church plus check service times and get directionsThe first time you run this app, you will be prompted to enter your churchâs website (i.e. www.firstcommunitychurch.com). After that you only login once and then the app remembers you from then on.For more info visit www.elexio.com/ampwave.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Excellent!!! Now I can make my tithes to my church on my phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t let me in.
reviews.comment: Can\'t get it to recognize my domain. It won\'t let me past the opening screen. Looks likes a app I could\'ve used.
reviews.author: Jay Burt
